title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: Awlad Hossain
description: Sit amet consectetur. Interdum porta pulvinar non sit aliquam. Aenean pulvinar blandit vel non enim elementum penatibus pellentesque ac. Nec accumsan euismod nulla adipiscing lectus. Morbi elementum a auctor erat diam tellus. Fermentum faucibus nulla enim ornare. Id neque neque pretium enim platea urna non dictum. Faucibus dignissim ridiculus nibh tristique massa non.

title: Moonlight Whispers
author: Selina Rahman
description: A haunting tale of love and self-discovery under the shadow of a moonlit sky. Blending magic and realism to explore identity and memory.

title: Last Summer's Echo
author: Tanvir Alam
description: An emotional journey through the final summer before adulthood, where friendships are tested and secrets revealed.

title: Dreams of Tomorrow
author: Nusrat Jahan
description: In a futuristic world driven by AI, a young girl finds her voice and challenges the system that silences her kind.

title: Where the River Flows
author: Reza Karim
description: A poetic narrative tracing the lives of villagers living along a mythical river, celebrating culture, loss, and rebirth.

title: Shadow and Light
author: Maliha Binte
description: A tale of duality and self-acceptance as a young artist struggles between expectations and dreams.

title: The Ocean's Call
author: Ahmed Sharif
description: When a mysterious journal washes ashore, a young boy is drawn into a tale of shipwreck, survival, and destiny.

title: Mind Maze
author: Farzana Sultana
description: A psychological exploration of trauma and healing as experienced by a therapist who slowly unravels her own mind.

title: When the Leaves Fall
author: Shahriar Noman
description: As autumn sets in, memories of lost love resurface in the life of a retired professor seeking closure and peace.

title: The Mindful Path
author: Dr. Nafisa Karim
description: A practical guide to mindfulness for managing stress, improving focus, and cultivating emotional intelligence.

title: Winds of History
author: Ahsan Habib
description: A sweeping account of South Asian political history from colonial rule to independence and beyond.

title: Born to Lead
author: Rumana Chowdhury
description: The inspiring life story of a female entrepreneur who transformed her rural beginnings into a tech empire.

title: Think Big, Start Small
author: Arif Mahmud
description: A strategic guide for small business owners to grow sustainably without losing vision.

title: Code and the Brain
author: Dr. Fariha Amin
description: Exploring the intersection of neuroscience and programming to understand how we think, code, and create.

title: Faith and Science
author: Zubair Rahman
description: An exploration of how science and Islamic teachings intersect in the modern age.

title: Kitchen Alchemy
author: Shamima Akter
description: Discover the science of flavors with this innovative cookbook blending tradition and technique.

title: Earth Today
author: Fazle Rabbi
description: A report-style narrative on the most pressing environmental issues of our time and how to act.

title: Learn More in Less Time
author: Tariq Hossain
description: Techniques and hacks for students to boost retention, study smarter, and master exam prep.

title: Freedom in Ink
author: Nilufa Yasmin
description: A powerful poetry collection capturing the voice of resistance, love, and liberation.
